CONVERSATION GROUP: BK revised from "Several decades after I was enslaved by the drow, I met Tezzarae. She was masquerading as a slave, making plans to stage an escape to liberate us from captivity.
BK revised from "I developed a deep hatred for the drow during my captivity. I have seen all the cruelty and brutality they can muster, all at the word of their demon goddess, Lolth."

After finding Soronil

TEXT: I was hoping you would come speak with me.
VO:     I was hoping you would come and speak with me.

I revised this to be clearer that the kids were actually forbidden from playing together. Original: "My parents scolded and punished, but all I could see was that that they wanted to keep me from my dear friend, the one child with whom I could play, laugh, and experience joy."
Bk added anger note here and replaced "my childhood friend" with Cerric's name to reinforce that character's name
BK cut the "by the dozens" because the actual counts seem to fluctuate

BK previous line she already said her family were captured, so I cut "When they reached my home, they took my family prisoner, and in" and revised "We had been given the sacred honor of protecting a relic of Sehanine."
Bk rephrased from "You got your own village destroyed?!"
BK revised from "You couldn't have known how it would play out. Not at your age."  "play out" sounded modern
BK cut ", even to the smallest extent," and tweaked end sentence.
BK revised from "When my village was attacked, the drow killed most, but they captured some to work as slaves. I was one among that number."
BK I cut "attack on my village and the" because it doesn't seem right... punishing them for losing the Moontear, yes, but not for being attacked.

BK revised from "By then, most of us were too afraid to go along. But something told me to trust her. And, true to her word, her plan worked. I and about five other slaves, mostly human and dwarven, managed to escape."

BK revised from "She taught me to survive in the Underdark, how to fight and find food, and she taught me the importance of faith. She showed me how to hide from duergar patrols, and she pointed the way to the surface world."

BK trimmed out "He won't catch us off our guard again."

BK revised from "I have only ever met one drow that ever showed me what I'd consider a good heart. The rest have all been liars, sadists, murderers, and worshippers of demons."
